sourcesContent:
<mat-form-field appearance="fill">
    <mat-label>Board Name</mat-label>
    <input matInput Object="">
</mat-form-field>
<mat-form-field appearance="fill">
    <mat-label>Drawing Number</mat-label>
    <input matInput Drawing="">
</mat-form-field>
<mat-form-field appearance="fill">
    <mat-label>Update Rate</mat-label>
    <input matInput Update="">
</mat-form-field>
<mat-form-field appearance="fill">
    <mat-label>Hardware Version</mat-label>
    <input matInput Hardware="">
</mat-form-field>
<mat-form-field>
    <mat-label>Comment</mat-label>
    <textarea matInput></textarea>
</mat-form-field>
<button (click)="openBoard()">Open Board</button>
